sample 	Nreads	passed	passed.w.trim	passed.total
BlCa0065	458948	8966	312563	321529
BlCa0076	426232	29245	285721	314966

BlCl0098	865526	40017	627674	667691
BlCl0116	402086	12070	274431	286501
StCa0001	670128	19177	498700	517877
StCa0003	565673	16008	364528	380536
StCa0006	1	1	0	1
StCa0015	362877	12706	247942	260648
StCa0016	608736	11026	408238	419264
StCa0019	284987	8040	197844	205884
StCf0037	539147	12181	367214	379395
StCf0039	391649	9390	261483	270873
StCf0043	328147	10166	227038	237204
StCf0044	587494	14047	392841	406888
StCf0049	742594	14827	493136	507963
StCf0050	255398	8213	176156	184369

    Nreads = total number of reads for a sample
    passed = retained reads that passed quality filtering at full length
    passed.w.trim= retained reads that were trimmed due to detection of adapters
    passed.total  = total kept reads of sufficient length
    note: you can set the option in params file to include trimmed reads of xx length.
